summary: This is a February 2019 bank statement for an account at Municipal Credit Union (MCU). It shows routine deposits from the City of New York payroll, H&R Block, and government agencies (DOJ, AGRI), along with numerous personal expenditures. The statement period is 02/01/19 - 02/28/19.

persons.name: Clyde Washington
persons.context: Name appears on a Visa deposit transaction on February 6, 2019.

persons.name: Tatiana Moore
persons.context: Name appears as the merchant ('SOC') for two Visa purchase withdrawals on February 9, 2019.

persons.name: Washington.Tarin
persons.context: Name appears as the recipient of a $20.00 mobile transfer from the account on February 21, 2019.

events.title: Account Activity Period
events.description: The document records all deposits and withdrawals for the checking and loan accounts for the month of February 2019.

events.title: DOJ Treasury Deposit
events.description: A deposit of $600.00 is made from 'DOJ TREAS 310', identified as a miscellaneous payment.

events.title: Agriculture Treasury Deposit
events.description: A deposit of $1,113.95 is made from 'AGRI TREAS 310', identified as a federal salary payment.

keyFacts: The account holder receives regular payroll deposits from the 'CITY OF NEW YORK'.
Two deposits from U.S. government treasuries are recorded: $600 from 'DOJ TREAS 310' on Feb 12 and $1,113.95 from 'AGRI TREAS 310' on Feb 22.
The account shows frequent cash withdrawals from ATMs at MCU branches and purchases at local businesses in Brooklyn and New York City.
The account includes a personal loan with a balance of $841.13 and an annual percentage rate of 12.5%.
A transfer was made to an individual named 'WASHINGTON.TARIN' on February 21, 2019.
